analysis.description:
Ownable.newOwner (/unique_chucks/17/0x2ef06079656f2ab9034b6252978c44104b7b2cc1.sol#90) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- acceptOwnership (/unique_chucks/17/0x2ef06079656f2ab9034b6252978c44104b7b2cc1.sol#116-123)

OOST.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0x2ef06079656f2ab9034b6252978c44104b7b2cc1.sol#209-210)
OOSTToken.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0x2ef06079656f2ab9034b6252978c44104b7b2cc1.sol#19-21)
Ownable.newOwner should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0x2ef06079656f2ab9034b6252978c44104b7b2cc1.sol#90)
